hero.underline: Oddiylik – asosiy tamoyil, qudrat esa zarurat tug‘ilganda.
hero.description: Sevimli Linux distributivingiz – Arch Linux asosini oson va qulay qilish uchun ishlab chiqilgan, aniq yo‘naltirilgan sozlamalar bilan.

features.beautySub: Go‘zal va zamonaviy dizayn – ishlashni yanada yoqimli qiladi.
features.btrfsSub: BTRFS tizimingizning snapshоtlarini oson yaratishga imkon beradi, bu esa muammolar yuzaga kelganda uni tezda tiklashni osonlashtiradi.
features.chaoticSub: Chaotic-AUR repozitoriyasiga kirish – minglab qo‘shimcha paketlardan foydalanish imkoniyati.
features.easyUseSub: Hayotingizni yengillashtirish uchun Arch Linux asosida ko‘plab qulaylik yaratuvchi xususiyatlarni taqdim etamiz.
features.fossSub: 100% bepul va ochiq kodli dasturiy ta’minot. Biz ochiq kodning qudratiga ishonamiz.
features.guiToolsSub: Hayotingizni yengillashtirish uchun tizim boshqaruvi vositalari, sozlash yordamchisi va boshqa ko‘plab grafik vositalarni taqdim etamiz.
features.subtitle: Distribusiyamizning imkoniyatlarini kashf eting.
features.title: Imkoniyatlar

highlights.assistantSub: Kuchli foydalanuvchilar uchun grafik yordamchi. Tizimingiz va uning eng muhim sozlamalarini oson boshqarish imkonini beradi.
highlights.fireDragonSub: Ishlash tezligi va maxfiylik uchun optimallashtirilgan FireDragon – ajoyib Floorp brauzeri forkidir, xuddi Firefox uchun Vivaldi kabi.
highlights.gamerSub: Geymerlar uchun asosiy vosita – Linuxda eng yaxshi o‘yin dasturlarini oson o‘rnatish imkonini beradi.
highlights.headSub: Distribusiyamizning maxsus vositalari afzalliklarini kashf eting.
highlights.subtitle: Distribusiyamizning maxsus vositalari imkoniyatlarini kashf eting.
highlights.sysMainSub: Ushbu vosita Arch-ga asoslangan distributsiyalardan foydalanishda yuzaga keladigan umumiy muammolarni hal qilishga yordam beradi va mumkin bo‘lgan muammolar haqida ogohlantiradi.
highlights.title: Asosiy jihatlar

blog.subtitle: Sevimli Linux distributsiyangizning so‘nggi yangiliklaridan xabardor bo‘ling.
blog.title: Blog

coc.title: Xulq-atvor kodeksi
coc.subtitle: Barchaga do‘stona, xavfsiz va samimiy muhit yaratishga sodiqmiz.

editions.title: Yuklanmalar
editions.subtitle: Garuda Linuxning turli nashrlaridan bahramand bo‘ling.
editions.advancedUseTooltip: Bu, odatda, Garuda taqdim etadigan ayrim qulaylik funksiyalari mavjud emasligini yoki ish stoli muhiti tez-tez o‘zgarib turishini anglatadi. Ushbu nashrlardan maksimal foyda olish uchun muammolarni mustaqil hal qilishga tayyor bo‘lishingiz kerak.

mokka.description: Go‘zal Catppuccin pastel mavzusidagi KDE ish stoli muhiti.
mokka.downloadNag: Siz yorqin interfeyslarni yoqtirasiz, shundaymi? Ajoyib tanlov!

dr460nized.description: Garuda Linuxning dr460nized nashrlari qorong‘i, rangli va to‘liq immersiv Plasma tajribasini taqdim etadi.
dr460nized.downloadNag: Yorqin interfeyslar va rang-barang dizayn yoqadimi? Bizda hammasi bor!

pro.2: Go‘zal, yuqori kontrastli va o‘tkir dizayn

con.2: Ba’zi foydalanuvchilar uchun ortiqcha rang-barang bo‘lishi mumkin

dr460nized-gaming.description: Ushbu Dr460nized nashri ko‘plab oldindan o‘rnatilgan o‘yin dasturlarini o‘z ichiga oladi.
dr460nized-gaming.downloadNag: Siz haqiqiy geymer bo‘lsangiz kerak! Omad va maroqli o‘yin tilaymiz!

con.1: Juda katta yuklab olish hajmi (>4.7 GB)
con.2: Keraksiz dasturlarni o‘z ichiga olishi mumkin

gnome.description: GNOME – zamonaviy, soddaligini va go‘zalligini o‘zida mujassam etgan ish stoli muhiti. U foydalanish qulayligiga asoslangan.
gnome.downloadNag: Demak, siz GNOME foydalanuvchisiz. Soddalikni yoqtirasiz, shundaymi!

pro.3: Ko‘plab Linux distributsiyalari uchun standart ish stoli muhiti

con.2: Maxsus o‘rnatilgan kengaytmalar yirik yangilanishlarda buzilish ehtimoliga ega

cinnamon.description: GNOME 2 ruhini eslatuvchi, moslashuvchanlik, tezlik va ko‘plab imkoniyatlarni taqdim etuvchi ish stoli muhiti.
cinnamon.downloadNag: Siz an’anaviy ish stoli tajribasining muxlisi bo‘lsangiz kerak, to‘g‘rimi?

xfce.description: XFCE tezkor va tizim resurslarini kam sarflovchi bo‘lishni maqsad qiladi, shu bilan birga chiroyli va foydalanuvchi uchun qulay bo‘lib qoladi.
xfce.downloadNag: Demak, siz an’anaviy ish stoli tajribasining muxlisi bo‘lsangiz kerak, to‘g‘rimi?

pro.2: Eng barqaror ish stoli muhitlaridan biri

con.1: Ba’zi foydalanuvchilar uchun haddan tashqari sodda bo‘lishi mumkin
con.2: KDE yoki GNOME kabi ko‘p funksiyalarga ega emas

sway.downloadNotice: Garuda Sway tayyor sozlamalar, qulay klaviatura qisqa yo‘llari va boshlang‘ich qo‘llanma bilan birga keladi. Nord rang sxemasiga asoslangan bo‘lib, u nafaqat chiroyli, balki yuqori samaradorlikka ega. Wayland uchun eng yaxshi mahalliy alternativalarni ishlatib, Wayland kompozitoriga silliq o‘tishni ta’minlaydi.

pro.1: Wayland asosida tez va samarali oyna boshqaruvi

i3.description: Yana bir an’anaviy oynalar boshqaruvchisi varianti.
i3.downloadNotice: Boshlash uchun qulay qo‘llanma bilan tayyor sozlamalarni taqdim etamiz.
i3.downloadNag: Tiling window manager bilan maroqli ishlang!

pro.1: Xorg asosida tez va samarali oyna boshqaruvi

hyprland.downloadNotice: Shuni yodda tutingki, muammolarni mustaqil hal qilishga tayyor bo‘lishingiz kerak. Hyprland juda mashhur va chiroyli bo‘lsa-da, tez rivojlanayotgan loyihadir, shuning uchun u beqaror bo‘lishi mumkin.
hyprland.downloadNag: "Men Hyprland ishlataman, aytgancha!" deb hammaga aytishni unutmang!

pro.2: Perfect for users who like to tinker
pro.3: A good choice for those who like to try new things

con.2: Requires some knowledge to troubleshoot issues

kdeLite.description: A beautiful and modern desktop environment.
kdeLite.downloadNotice: This edition requires you to set up most of the theming and device settings yourself. It misses some of the quality of life features Garuda usually provides, which is why we recommend it for advanced users only.
kdeLite.downloadNag: The stock KDE experience, grab it while it's hot!

con.1: Needs the user to set up most of the theming and device settings
con.2: Might be missing some quality of life features

garudaNixSubsystem.description: This is technically not a desktop environment, but a subsystem that allows you to run NixOS in a BTRFS sub-volume of the same partition you installed Garuda to. It derives certain settings from your Garuda installation like the user, password or graphics drivers.
garudaNixSubsystem.downloadNotice: This is not an ISO you can boot from. You need to install another Garuda edition (eg. dr460nized) first before installing the Garuda Nix Subsystem via the "garuda-nix-subsystem" package. You can find more information on the dedicated documentation page.
garudaNixSubsystem.downloadNag: You must be a real tinkerer, right?

pro.1: Lets you easily try out NixOS
pro.2: Derives certain settings from your Garuda installation, and can be easily removed
pro.3: Shares most common home folders with the Garuda installation

con.1: Only supports the dr460nized style of Garuda
con.2: Should only be used by highly advanced users who like to tinker around with NixOS

lang.title: Available languages
lang.tooltip: Please note that blog and news data is only provided in English.

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: This page will guide you through the Garuda Linux installation process and provide recommendations.
installation.setup: So you've decided to give Garuda Linux a try? Great! Let's have a look at a few things you should know before you start the installation.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.subtitle: Before you begin, make sure you meet the following requirements

list.opengl: A graphics card supporting at least OpenGL 3.3
list.usbPre: A USB stick with at least

requirements.note: We specifically set these requirements to ensure a smooth experience and also to have enough storage space for BTRFS snapshots. If your computer meets these requirements, you are good to go!
requirements.startDownload: Let's download the ISO before continuing with the installation procedure.
requirements.noEditionSelected: It looks like you haven't selected an edition yet. Please select an edition first

procedure.title: Installation procedure
procedure.subtitle: Now that you have met the requirements, you can proceed with the installation.
procedure.biosKeys: Boot the PC and press the manufacturer specific key to open your device's setup utility. Common keys used: Esc, Delete, F1, F2, F9, F10, F11, or F12.
procedure.biosKeysFind: Find more common keys and buttons
procedure.secureBoot: Disable fastboot and secure boot. It may not be possible to disable the latter explicitly - try clearing the secure boot keys instead. Check the manual of your device/motherboard for further info.
procedure.ahci: Make sure that your device's SATA controller is set to AHCI mode in your device's setup utility - otherwise, the Linux kernel may not be able to detect your drive.
procedure.uefi: If your firmware supports UEFI, then configure your device to use UEFI only in its setup utility. UEFI is much preferred over BIOS whenever possible.
procedure.createUsb: Create a bootable USB using DD/Etcher/Ventoy/Rufus. Ventoy is the easiest method and allows multiple editions on the one USB, while DD/Etcher the most reliable.
procedure.startInstaller: After booting the live media, start the installer and follow the guided installation procedure.
procedure.recommendations: While the installation is running, please consider reading the following recommendations.

considerations.title: Considerations and recommendations
considerations.dualBoot: Dual-booting Garuda Linux may lead to unexpected issues! Be aware that the other OS may change the EFI boot priorities on UEFI or overwrite the bootloader on BIOS systems.
considerations.vm: Our distro is optimized for performance on real hardware. Installing in virtual machines is not recommended as it may result in a bad experience due to the missing graphics acceleration.
considerations.snapd: Try to avoid using Snapd and Flatpak where possible. They are considered unsupported.
considerations.updater: Garuda Linux ships an update tool, which we strongly recommend using to run system updates. Running pacman directly is not recommended, as garuda-update was specifically designed to help with common issues on Arch-based distributions.
considerations.updaterLink: Read more about the updater to find out what it does

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: The page you are looking for does not exist.
